house-rule-enable.name: Armor Ablates Easier house rule
house-rule-enable.hint: Enable or disable the Armor Ablates Easier house rule. Any time a hit is scored against an opponent, even if that attack doesn't pierce the armor, the armor still ablates by 1.

armor-sp-ignore-threshold.name: Armor SP ignore threshold
armor-sp-ignore-threshold.hint: The SP value for which armor ignores this effect. For example: if this is set to 13, armor with remaining SP of 13 or higher will not be ablated under this rule.

message.ablate: Armor Ablates Easier 0 damage dealt, but {attacker} ablates {target}'s armor by {ablation} SP
